hail holy light ofspring heav n first born th eternal coeternal beam may express thee unblam

shalt thou descending assume mans nature less n degrade thine owne
thou hast though thron highest bliss equal god equally enjoying god like fruition quitted save world utter loss hast found merit birthright son god found worthiest good farr great high thee love hath abounded glory abounds therefore thy humiliation shall exalt thee thy manhood also throne shalt thou sit incarnate shalt reigne god man son god man anointed universal king power give thee reign ever assume thy merits thee head supream thrones princedoms powers dominions reduce knees thee shall bow bide heaven earth earth hell thou attended gloriously heav n shalt skie appeer thee send summoning arch angels proclaime thy dread tribunal forthwith windes living forthwith cited dead past ages general doom shall hast n peal shall rouse thir sleep
thy saints assembl thou shalt judge bad men angels arraignd shall sink beneath thy sentence hell numbers full thenceforth shall ever shut
mean world shall burn ashes spring new heav n earth wherein shall dwell thir tribulations long see golden days fruitful golden deeds joy love triumphing fair truth

ye gods adore compass dies adore son honour mee

proud art thou met

th incestuous mother thus repli

zarathustra discourses

three metamorphoses
three metamorphoses spirit designate spirit becometh camel camel lion lion last child
many heavy things spirit strong load bearing spirit reverence dwelleth heavy heaviest longeth strength
heavy
asketh load bearing spirit kneeleth like camel wanteth well laden
heaviest thing ye heroes
asketh load bearing spirit may take upon rejoice strength
humiliate oneself order mortify one pride
exhibit one folly order mock one wisdom
desert cause celebrateth triumph
ascend high mountains tempt tempter
feed acorns grass knowledge sake truth suffer hunger soul
sick dismiss comforters make friends deaf never hear thy requests
go foul water water truth disclaim cold frogs hot toads

tree hill

thou saidst truth zarathustra

often overleap steps clamber none steps pardons

lo
since thou hast appeared amongst us

walked together zarathustra began speak thus rendeth heart

yet thou art free thou still seekest freedom

thy wild dogs want liberty bark joy cellar thy spirit endeavoureth open prison doors
still art thou prisoner seemeth deviseth liberty ah

ah

broke wings spirit creepeth defileth gnaweth

child mirror

verily say unto good evil would everlasting doth exist
accord must ever surpass anew
values formulae good evil ye exercise power ye valuing ones secret love sparkling trembling overflowing souls
stronger power groweth values new surpassing breaketh egg egg shell
hath creator good evil verily hath first destroyer break values pieces
thus doth greatest evil pertain greatest good however creating good let us speak thereof ye wisest ones even though bad
silent worse suppressed truths become poisonous
let everything break break truths
many house still built thus spake zarathustra

convalescent

great longing
soul taught thee say to day time formerly dance thy measure every yonder
soul delivered thee by places brushed thee dust spiders twilight
soul washed petty shame by place virtue thee persuaded thee stand naked eyes sun
storm called spirit blow thy surging sea clouds blow away strangled even strangler called sin soul gave thee right say nay like storm say yea open heaven saith yea calm light remainest thou walkest denying storms
soul restored thee liberty created uncreated knoweth thou knowest voluptuousness future
soul taught thee contempt doth come like worm eating great loving contempt loveth contemneth
soul taught thee persuade thou persuadest even grounds thee like sun persuadeth even sea height

flew doves fro perched shoulder caressed white hair tire tenderness joyousness
strong lion however licked always tears fell zarathustra hands roared growled shyly
thus animals do went long time short time properly speaking time earth things
meanwhile however higher men awakened zarathustra cave marshalled procession go meet zarathustra give morning greeting found awakened longer tarried
however reached door cave noise steps preceded lion started violently turned away zarathustra roaring wildly sprang towards cave
higher men however heard lion roaring cried aloud one voice fled back vanished instant
zarathustra however stunned strange rose seat looked around stood astonished inquired heart bethought remained alone
hear said last slowly happened unto soon came recollection took glance taken place yesterday to day
indeed stone said stroked beard sat yester morn came soothsayer unto heard first cry heard great cry distress
ye higher men distress old soothsayer foretold yester morn unto distress want seduce tempt zarathustra said come seduce thee thy last sin last sin cried zarathustra laughed angrily words hath reserved last sin zarathustra became absorbed sat big stone meditated
suddenly sprang fellow suffering
fellow suffering higher men cried countenance changed brass
well
hath time
suffering fellow suffering matter
strive happiness
strive work
well
lion hath come children nigh zarathustra hath grown ripe mine hour hath come morning day beginneth arise arise thou great noontide thus spake zarathustra left cave glowing strong like morning sun coming gloomy mountains
